entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:12 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
